prompt --application/pages/page_10011 begin -- Manifest -- PAGE: 10011 -- Manifest End wwv_flow_api.component_begin ( p_version_yyyy_mm_dd=>'2020.10.01' ,p_release=>'20.2.0.00.20' ,p_default_workspace_id=>9748850854216151 ,p_default_application_id=>103 ,p_default_id_offset=>0 ,p_default_owner=>'DEMO' ); wwv_flow_api.create_page( p_id=>10011 ,p_user_interface_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(20307810813402751) ,p_name=>'Help' ,p_alias=>'PAGE_HELP' ,p_page_mode=>'MODAL' ,p_step_title=>'Help' ,p_autocomplete_on_off=>'OFF' ,p_page_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#' ,p_required_patch=>wwv_flow_api.id(20310085796402758) ,p_dialog_chained=>'N' ,p_protection_level=>'C' ,p_last_updated_by=>'DEMO' ,p_last_upd_yyyymmddhh24miss=>'20210917161326' ); wwv_flow_api.create_page_plug( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(20320732364402800) ,p_plug_name=>'Search Dialog' ,p_region_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#' ,p_escape_on_http_output=>'Y' ,p_plug_template=>wwv_flow_api.id(20194273734402670) ,p_plug_display_sequence=>10 ,p_plug_display_point=>'BODY' ,p_plug_source=>wwv_flow_string.join(wwv_flow_t_varchar2( 'for c1 in ', '(', ' select page_title, help_text ', ' from apex_application_pages', ' where page_id = :P10011_PAGE_ID ', ' and application_id = :APP_ID', ')', 'loop', ' if c1.help_text is null then', ' sys.htp.p(''No help is available for this page.'');', ' else', ' if substr(c1.help_text, 1, 3) != ''

'' then', ' sys.htp.p(''

'');', ' end if;', '', ' sys.htp.p(apex_application.do_substitutions(c1.help_text));', '', ' if substr(trim(c1.help_text), -4) != ''

'' then', ' sys.htp.p(''

'');', ' end if;', ' end if;', 'end loop;')) ,p_plug_source_type=>'NATIVE_PLSQL' ,p_plug_query_num_rows=>15 ); wwv_flow_api.create_page_item( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(20321130992402800) ,p_name=>'P10011_PAGE_ID' ,p_item_sequence=>10 ,p_item_plug_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(20320732364402800) ,p_display_as=>'NATIVE_HIDDEN' ,p_lov_display_extra=>'NO' ,p_protection_level=>'S' ,p_attribute_01=>'Y' ); wwv_flow_api.component_end; end;
